backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with types, maps, counters, authorization mixin, and initial query method for office address.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration from old actor data to new format by adding payslip and principal-to-employee maps and initializing new counters.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for documentation or build reference.
frontend/BUILDING.md: Provides basic instructions for building and deploying the frontend application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the frontend app and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures all application routes including public pages, employee dashboard, and HR-admin routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/animations/Hover: Wraps text in a hover-triggered slide-in animation with optional delay.
frontend/src/components/animations/Slide: Animates text sliding in when it enters the viewport using an in-view hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied screen with context-specific messaging and login or navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminProtec: Protects routes requiring admin access, showing loading or denial screens based on auth and admin checks.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout button behavior using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to set up their profile and save name and email.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Guards routes for authenticated users, showing a loader or access denied if needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleProtect: Wraps content requiring authentication, showing loading or access denied for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Implements a contact form with validation, submission mutation, and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactM: Displays a sorted list of contact messages with metadata, status badge, and message content.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactS: Renders a contact section with animated form and contact info cards using intersection observers.
frontend/src/components/employees/Employ: Form for creating or updating an employee, with validation and API mutations.
Displays a table of employees with formatted fields and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/jobroles/JobRole: Form for creating job roles with validation and submission to backend.
Renders a job roles table showing title, location, status, and a LinkedIn link.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipCard.t: Renders a styled leadership profile card with icon, name, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/leaves/LeaveEntr: Panel for viewing and adding employee leave entries with a dialog and table display.
Form for creating leave entries, validating dates and reason, and submitting via useAddLeaveEntry.
frontend/src/components/nav/FadeNavLabel: Animated span wrapper that fades nav label text on hover or focus.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileMenuTo: Animated hamburger/X icon that changes appearance based on the open state with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/payslips/Payslip: Lists and sorts payslips with metadata and provides a download button for each.
frontend/src/components/PublicLayout.tsx: Defines the public site layout with navigation, mobile menu handling, and scroll-based section navigation.
frontend/src/components/salary/SalaryBre: Card displaying an employee’s salary components and final payable amount.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Renders an expandable service card with features list, quick view, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Modal showing service details, features, and navigation options to full details or Compliance First.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EmployeeMu: Employee selector with search, checkboxes, and removable badges for assigned employees.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing tasks, handling fields, employee assignment, priority, and submitting mutations.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TasksTable: Table showing tasks with priority, assignees, status, and actions to edit or delete.
frontend/src/data/services.ts: Defines the Service interface and a list of service objects with metadata and features, plus a helper to fetch a service by slug.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapError.ts: Provides a hook returning a static null bootstrap error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplianceFirstFee: Fetches and caches compliance-related news from The Guardian via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hooks for login, identity management, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Implements an IntersectionObserver-based hook to detect when an element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods for users, roles, employees, tasks, and related data.
frontend/src/hooks/useTailoredSolutionsF: Fetches and caches HR and business-related articles from The Guardian via react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme variables, dark mode styles, global resets, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About Us page with mission, values, and leadership sections using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ComplianceFirstPage.t: Displays a compliance news feed with loading, error, empty, and content states using animated cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows the Contact Us page header and embeds the ContactSection component with business hours.
frontend/src/pages/employee/EmployeeDash: Renders an authenticated employee dashboard showing tasks, payslips, and profile info with loading and error fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Displays a grid of clickable game cards that open external game links in new tabs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with animated hero text, services, navigation interactions, and contact sections.
frontend/src/pages/hr/AccessManagementPa: Empty placeholder page for HR access management.
frontend/src/pages/hr/ContactMessagesPag: Displays contact form submissions with loading skeletons and an empty state, using a message list component.
frontend/src/pages/hr/EmployeeDetailPage: Provides a detailed employee view with tabs for overview, leave entries, and editing, including loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/hr/EmployeesPage.tsx: Displays employee directory with search, table view, and a dialog to add employees.
frontend/src/pages/hr/HrEmployeePayslips: Loads an employee's payslips, allows generating new monthly payslips, and handles loading and missing states.
frontend/src/pages/hr/HrEmployeeSalaryPa: Shows detailed salary breakdown for a selected employee with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/hr/HrEmployeeTasksPag: Displays tasks assigned to an employee with priority badges, loading state, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/hr/HrLayout.tsx: Provides HR dashboard layout with navigation menu, mobile sidebar, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/hr/JobRolesPage.tsx: Lists open job roles, provides a dialog to add new roles, and shows skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/pages/hr/QuickLeaveMarkPage: Provides a form for HR to mark a single‑day leave for an employee using query hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/hr/TasksPage.tsx: Displays all tasks with loading/error states and includes a dialog for creating or editing tasks.
frontend/src/pages/RecruitmentPage.tsx: Fetches and displays open job roles with loading placeholders, job cards, and a fallback when no roles exist.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a selected service with features, description, and navigation controls, falling back to a not-found message if the service is missing.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a list of all services with quick-view modal support and an introductory description.
frontend/src/pages/TailoredSolutionsPage: Fetches and displays tailored HR solution articles with animated headers, handling loading, error, empty, and results states.
frontend/src/pages/TeamPage.tsx: Presents an animated team showcase with member profiles and images, triggered by scroll visibility.
frontend/src/utils/deployDiagnostics.ts: Collects and logs environment and build diagnostics plus actor and identity status to the console.
frontend/src/utils/env.ts: Utility for safely accessing Vite environment variables with helpers for defaults and II URL retrieval.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Contains currency and timestamp formatting helpers for INR and date display.
frontend/src/utils/navigateHome.ts: Handles navigation to the homepage and smooth scrolling, cleaning hashes when needed.
frontend/src/utils/payslipDownload.ts: Generates styled HTML for a payslip and prepares it for download using payslip data and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/salary.ts: Calculates an employee’s salary breakdown including base, bonus, deductions, and final payable.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Provides helpers to scroll smoothly to sections and map routes to section IDs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings with extended theme utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing HR/employee dashboard features, role-based access rules, payslip generation requirements, and pending feature requests.
